item.title: What do Arab Muslims think about ISIS (Daesh)?
item.description: Welcome to my very first blogpost. Here I want to dive a little bit into how Arab Muslims see Daesh (a term for ISIS often used by Arab speakers). The data I will be using is from the Arab Barometer Wave 4, released just a few weeks ago. I will also be using the Arab Barometer in the future because it has a lot of interesting questions asked, including a small sample size of Syrian refugees.
